channel.title: Difficult Question?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
This seems to be a rather difficult question for anyone to answer.... maybe someone here is smart enough! haha
[b]Is there anyway to send a mass email to all of my registered members on my Vbulletin forums? An email, like to all of them? If so, how can I go about doing it?
Thanks in advance to those of you who answer this![/b]

item.title: Difficult Question?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“bode, post:3, topic:329499”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=425883.msg3128346#msg3128346 date=1266209479]
How is this difficult at all? Just query your MySQL database for all of your users’ email address, and invoke php’s mail() function.
[/quote]

I didn’t understand a single word.[/quote]
Your users information is stored in a database with MySQL. You can use PHP to access that information, and then use PHP to also send an email to all address’s it finds.

Read full topic
